TEXT_ORIGINAL: それは・・・漆黒の闇の底に落した１つの林檎のように見えた。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: It ... looked like a single apple that fell to the bottom of jet-black darkness.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: It ... looks like a lone apple|surrounded by jet black darkness.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 周囲を高い壁で被われ外部と遮断された街・・・レイク・サイド。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: A city surrounded by high walls and isolated from the outside ... Lake Side.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: Lake Side. A city surrounded by high walls and isolated from the outside world.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 周りの闇とは対照的に街の中には家が建ち並び光に満ち溢れていた
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: In contrast to the surrounding darkness, there were houses lined up in the city and full of light
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: In contrast to the surrounding darkness, there are houses of people in the city and streets full of light.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 俺の名前は、『ジョージ』。この街で修理屋をやっている。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: My name is "George". I'm a repair shop in this town.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: My name is George. I run a repair shop in town.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 修理屋といっても皆が想像するあれとはちょっとちがう。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: Even if it's a repair shop, it's a little different from what everyone imagines.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: I say repair shop, but its a bit different to what you would expect a repair shop to be.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 時々、壁の外から飛来して若い女の子をさらっていくステロイドとﾁ呼ばれる奴らから身を守る武器を作るのが俺達修理屋だ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: We repair shops make weapons that protect us from the so-called steroids, who sometimes fly from outside the walls and kidnap young girls.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: Repair shops make weapons that protect us from the so called steroids, mechanised beasts who sometimes fly from outside the walls and kidnap people.

TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: This seems to be loading the graphic "pic\op6a.pr7” which is the static image of the Temptation Spring wooded area.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: レイク・サイドの街のはずれには誘惑の泉と呼ばれる泉がある。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: On the outskirts of Lake Side, there is a spring called the Temptation Spring.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: On the outskirts of Lake Side, there is a glade called Temptation Spring.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ここには、一口飲めば体中に力が涌いてくるし二口飲めば大抵のﾁ病気も治ってしまう不思議な水が涌いている。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: There is a mysterious water here that takes a sip to all over your body and a double sip cures most of the illnesses.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: そうそう、時々ステロイドが落していくジルニウムという金属もﾁこの水に浸すと一時に柔らかくなって簡単に加工できるようになる
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: Oh yeah, the metal called zirunium, where steroids sometimes drop, becomes soft at one time when soaked in this water, making it easy to process

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 俺達修理屋もここの水とジルニウムを使って武器を作るんだ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: We repair shops also use this water and zirconium to make weapons.

This seems to load several images in sequence: "pic\op7a.pr7” through to "pic\op7e.pr7" – this is the vertically scrolling image of the naked girl bathing in the water (from bottom to top), followed by her head turning towards the viewer.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 彼女の名前はミリア。俺のフィアンセだ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: Her name is Milia. It's my fiance.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: Her name is Milia and she is my fiance.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: 今日も、俺が仕事で泉に行くっていったらついてきちまった。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: Today, when I went to the fountain for work, I followed him.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: Just today I went to the fountain and she came with me.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: まったく、俺は仕事でここに来てるのにまったくミリアときたらﾁ早速水浴びを始めちまった。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: I'm here for work, but when it's just Miria, I just started bathing.
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: Since it was just Milia and I, we started bathing in the water.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: まあ、俺も目の保養になるからいいかなって・・・
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: Well, I think it'll be good for my eyes too …
TEXT_CONVERTED_ENGLISH: Well… I guess that could be good for my eyes too!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: そのミリアが泉のほとりでとんでもないものを見つけちまった
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: Then Milia found a ridiculous thing by the spring
This loads "pic\op8a.pr7” and "pic\op8b.pr7” which are images of the ruined steroid mecha and then the same mecha in a repair bar. The ruined images are vertically scrolled (from top to bottom).

TEXT_ORIGINAL: なんと、森の中にあったのは壊れたステロイドだった。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: What was in the forest was a broken steroid.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ミリアと相談して俺達はここでこのステロイドを治すことにした
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: In consultation with Milia we decided to cure this steroid her

Loads images "pic\op9.pr7”, "pic\opa.pr7 and animation file "ani\op-11a.ani. This is the animation of Milia talking to you over lunch/dinner – well, she has a spoon in her hand and there is a loaf of bread next to her. NOTE that after this section there is not a delimiter to the next text string!!!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］あのステロイドの修理もあと、もうすこしね。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Milia] I'll have to repair that steroid soon.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］ああ、もうほとんど修理は終ったよ。あとは、一度街に戻って制御装置を取り付ければ動くだろうな。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Ah, almost all repairs are done. After that, if you go back to the city and install the control device, it will work.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］でも、すごいわね。森の中でステロイドを見つけたときも驚いたけどそれを直して動くようにしちゃうんだから。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Milia] But it's amazing. I was surprised when I found a steroid in the forest, but I fixed it and made it work.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］少しは俺のことを見直した？
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Did you revisit me a little?
[Milia] Yeah, very.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］ねぇジョージ。私、少しだけ心配なことがあるのよ
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Milia] Hey George. I have some worries
Loads image "pic\opb.pr7” and animation file "ani\op-11b.ani which is an animated headshot of Milia talking. NOTE that after this section there is not a delimiter to the next text string!!!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］あのステロイドと一緒に見つけた・・・
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Milia] I found it with that steroid ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］ああ、あの薄紫色をした水晶みたいな玉のことだろう。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Yeah, maybe that lilac-colored crystal ball.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］ええ、あの玉を見てるとなんだか吸い込まれそうな・・・とにかくとっても不安な気持ちになるのよ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Millia] Yeah, when you look at that ball, it seems like you'll be sucked in ... it just makes me feel uneasy.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］ねえ、お願いだからその玉はもとあった場所に戻してきてくれない。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Milia] Hey, please don't bring the ball back to where it was.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］まったく・・・ミリアは心配症だから。俺にはただの水晶玉にしか見えないぜ！
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Exactly ... Milia is anxious. It just looks like a crystal ball to me!
[Millia] But ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］まあ、これはあのステロイドの横に落ちてただけで直接ステロイドに関係のあるものじゃないかもしれないしな・・・。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Well, this may have nothing to do with steroids just because it fell next to it.
[Millia] But ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］わかったよ。あとでもとあったところに戻してくるわ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] I see. I'll come back to where it originally was.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ミリア］ごめん・・・わがままいって・・・。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Milia] I'm sorry ... I'm so selfish ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］んっ？何か音がしないか。ほらっ！こっちに近付いてきてる！
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Hmm? Is there any sound? See! It's approaching me!
[Milia] By the way ...

This big block of data describes the images and animations shown when the steroid baddies swoop in and kidnap Milia. There’s a big block of data, then references to the images: "pic\opca.pr”, "pic\opcb.pr7”, "pic\opcc.pr7”,  "pic\opcd.pr7", "pic\opce.pr7”, "pic\opd.pr7” and animation file "ani\op-13.ani”. Clearly this is different to all the previous animation/slideshow examples. The images shown are: Milia screaming open-mouthed, Milia being grasped by the flying Steroid, the flying Steroid about to take off, George grasping for Milia as the Steroid flys away, both Steroids flying away, an animation of a red-haired woman with a heart below her left eye (Rupia) talking to you. No text is shown during this part until the animation of Rupia talking to you.
[Girl] Did you wake up?

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］君は・・・誰？・・・何で俺の名前を知っているんだ！。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Who are you? ... why do you know my name! ..

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［女の子］私の名前はルピア。今までは、あなたが森でひろった薄紫の水晶に封印されていたのよ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Girl] My name is Rupiah. Until now, you've been sealed in a pale purple crystal in the forest.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］封印？それじゃあ君はあの水晶から出てきたって言うのか？
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Sealed? Then do you say that you came out of that crystal?
[Rupia] Yeah, right.
[George] Such ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］そんな馬鹿なはずはないって言いたいんでしょうけどこれは、冗談でもなんでもないのよ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] I'd say I can't be silly, but it's not a joke.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］ついでに言っておくとあなたが森で見つけたステロイドは私が捕まえたのよ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] Incidentally, I caught the steroid you found in the woods.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］ステロイド・・・みっミリアはどうしたんだ！
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Steroids ... What happened to Mimiglia!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］残念だけどステロイドにさらわれちゃったわ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] Unfortunately, I was kidnapped by steroids.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］ちきしょう！なんてことだ！俺がついていながら・・・。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] Let's go! What! While I'm on ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］でも、あなたには私と修理が終ったステロイドがいるじゃない。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] But you don't have a repaired steroid with me.
[George] Eh!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］あなたが、直接あのステロイドに乗り込んでさらわれた彼女を助けに行くのよ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] You go directly to the steroid to help her who was kidnapped.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］でも、俺はステロイドの奴らが街の外からあの塀を越えてくるって事しか知らないんだぜ！
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] But I only know that the steroid guys are crossing that fence from outside the city!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］それにあの壁の外がどうなっているか誰も知らないのに・・・。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] And no one knows what's going on outside of that wall ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］でも、私はだいたい知っているわ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] But I generally know.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］お前はいったい・・・
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] You are ...

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］私のことはとりあえずおいておいて・・・あの壁の外の世界について私の知っているかぎりのことを教えてあげるわ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] For the time being, leave me alone ... I'll tell you as far as I know about the world outside that wall.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］まず、あの壁の向こうにはこの街とおなじような閉ざされた街がいくつもあってこことおなじように人が住んでいるの。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] First of all, behind that wall are many closed towns like this one, and people live in the same way here.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］それぞれの街にはここと同じく泉があって体力の回復が出来るわ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] In each city, there is a spring like here and you can recover your physical strength.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］おそらくステロイドは、その中のどこかからここに来るんだわ。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] Probably steroids come here from somewhere.

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ジョージ］ミリアが助かる可能性が少しでもあるんならいってみるしかないな！
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [George] If there is any chance that Milia will be saved, I have to try!

TEXT_ORIGINAL: ［ルピア］さあ、ぐずぐずしてる暇はないわ。いきましょう。
TEXT_LITERAL_ENGLISH: [Rupia] Come on, I don't have time to waste. let's go.
